name: hand in Hand
description:
Boktaboli, is a small town in Bangladesh. Its main industry is brick manufacturing and agriculture(potatoes, mainly). Many of the town's men have something in common -- they work as migrant labourers in Singapore, mainly toiling in the construction industry. 

In 2013, I had the privilege of returning to Boktaboli with a veteran migrant worker, Salim, to work on a documentary about the birth of his first child.
